job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a software consultant who has gotten really good at using generative AI tools over the past couple of years? Are you tired of being a PowerPoint monkey? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming, * Ensure 100% of clients achieve 100% of their business goals through AI-driven professional services engagements
job_details.full_text:
Implementation Engineer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a software consultant who has gotten really good at using generative AI tools over the past couple of years? Are you tired of being a PowerPoint monkey? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming, * Ensure 100% of clients achieve 100% of their business goals through AI-driven professional services engagements

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use of generative AI tools to enhance productivity in a consulting context, rather than building or engineering AI systems. It explicitly states 'Coding or programming' is not part of the role, and the focus is on applying AI to existing processes and client service.

job_tasks.justification: While not building models, the core of the role involves leveraging generative AI capabilities, which aligns with the 'adapting' aspect of TASK3, albeit at a user/application level.
This phrase directly relates to understanding client needs and ensuring technical solutions (AI-enhanced) meet business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the strategic application of AI to achieve business outcomes and client satisfaction.

job_tasks.phrase: focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service
job_tasks.justification: Although it states 'no coding or programming', 'building systems' in the context of consulting services implies configuring and integrating solutions, which is a form of system building, and 'client service' is a core consulting function.

job_tasks.phrase: aligning technology with client business goals
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of aligning technical capabilities with business objectives, a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: gathering and analyzing customer business requirements
job_tasks.justification: This is a fundamental part of understanding the business context and translating it into actionable requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding client needs and providing expert advice based on business context and best practices within the consulting domain.

job_tasks.phrase: training clients on the software platform
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the business application of the software and communicating its value and usage to clients.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform
job_tasks.justification: This involves setting up and customizing a software platform to meet client needs, which can be considered a form of system configuration and integration, even without traditional coding.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly mentions using generative AI to enhance project outcomes, fitting the application of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure 100% of clients achieve 100% of their business goals through AI-driven professional services engagements
job_tasks.justification: This is a high-level business objective focused on client success and aligning services with business goals.

technologies.justification: Refers to the category of generative models, though specific models are not named.

soft_skills.phrase: software consultant who has gotten really good at using generative AI tools
soft_skills.justification: Implies a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new AI tools and their applications.
Indicates a proactive and forward-thinking approach to work.

soft_skills.phrase: focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service
soft_skills.justification: Highlights problem-solving in the context of client needs and service delivery.

soft_skills.phrase: thrives on using AI to push boundaries
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a proactive and innovative mindset, taking initiative to explore new possibilities with AI.

soft_skills.phrase: relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a strong aptitude for problem-solving by bridging technology and business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: strategic input has real, measurable impact
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes ownership and a results-oriented approach, taking responsibility for the impact of strategic contributions.
Suggests an innovative and ownership-driven mindset focused on driving significant change.
